Foreign diplomatic envoys visit Sinchon Museum
articles.content:
Foreign diplomatic envoys visit Sinchon Museum
   Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys and embassy officials of Palestine, Nigeria, Libya, Syria, Egypt, Ethiopia and  Yemen here visited the Sinchon Museum on May 31.   The visitors looked round materials and exhibits showing bestial atrocities of the U.S. aggressors in Sinchon  during the Fatherland Liberation War.
   They bitterly denounced the U.S.'s thrice-cursed crimes against the Korean people.

Friendly meeting on International Children's Day
articles.content:
Friendly meeting on International Children's Day
   Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting of women and children in Pyongyang and foreign women and children was held at Mangyongdae fun fair on Tuesday  on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of June 1, the  International Children's Day.   Present there were secretary Kim Jung Rin of the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea, officials concerned, women and children in the city.  Wives of foreign diplomatic envoys here, foreign women and children were invited.   They held colourful sports games and amusements including folk games,  toy-picking, partner-finding, robot-assembling and stars-pasting, while enjoying themselves with recreation facilities.

articles.title: DPRK wrestlers successful at Asian championship
articles.content:
DPRK wrestlers successful at Asian championship
   Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Korean wrestlers gave a good account of themselves at the 13th Asian Wrestling Championship. People's Sportsman Ri Yong Sam carried off a gold medal in 58kg category of the free-style wrestling.    Han Yong Do finished the runner-up in the 54kg category of free-style wrestling and Kim Kwang Il placed third in the 63kg category of free-style wrestling. More than 150 excellent wrestlers from 15 Asian countries and region including the DPRK participated in the championship, which was held in Tajikistan from May 25 to 27.
